statusLine.command: bash -c 'input=$(cat); dir=$(echo "$input" | jq -r ".workspace.current_dir"); model=$(echo "$input" | jq -r ".model.display_name"); user=$(whoami); branch=$(cd "$dir" && git branch --show-current 2>/dev/null); if [ -n "$branch" ] && [ ${#branch} -gt 40 ]; then branch="${branch:0:27}...${branch: -10}"; fi; dirty=""; if [ -n "$branch" ] && [ -n "$(cd "$dir" && git status --porcelain 2>/dev/null)" ]; then dirty=" *"; fi; pct=""; usage=$(echo "$input" | jq ".context_window.current_usage"); if [ "$usage" != "null" ]; then cur=$(echo "$usage" | jq ".input_tokens + .cache_creation_input_tokens + .cache_read_input_tokens"); sz=$(echo "$input" | jq ".context_window.context_window_size"); pct=$((cur * 100 / sz)); fi; out="\e[36m${user}\e[0m :: \e[32m$(basename "$dir")\e[0m"; if [ -n "$branch" ]; then out="$out on \e[35m${branch}${dirty}\e[0m"; fi; out="$out :: \e[90m[${model}]\e[0m"; if [ -n "$pct" ]; then out="$out :: \e[33m${pct}%\e[0m"; fi; echo -e "$out"'
